add_contact_info: Add the number +16206469306 to your contact list under the name Santa Claus so that his name appears when he calls.
acertingArtCommitment: At Acerting Art, we commit to support [NGO Name], dedicated to [brief description of the NGO and its mission]. A percentage of every transaction on our site goes directly to support this cause.
donation_message: For every purchase made, [X]% is donated to [NGO Name]. These contributions help to [describe how the money is used, for example, food, education, health, etc.].
commitment_to_transparency: We are committed to total transparency. All donations are recorded and reported quarterly, which can be reviewed [link or review method].

mother_name_placeholder: Mother's name, enter n/d if you do not wish to specify

modal_help_text:
Speak with Santa Claus

Fill in the form and Santa Claus AI will call at the indicated time and day to talk to the person you indicate!

How to use:

Child's name: -- Introduce the child's name Santa Claus will be talking to

Father's name: -- His father's name. Write down n/d if you prefer to omit this data.

Mother's name: -- Enter his mother's name. Write down n/d if you prefer to not specify.

Gifts that he asked Santa Claus -- Enter the list of gifts he asked Santa Claus for, so the AI can play a better role and when Santa Claus talks he already knows what gifts he asked for.

Select a country: -- Indicate the country where the child to call is, to select the time zone afterwards and call at the appropriate time.

Call date: -- Introduce the day you want the call to be made. dd = day, mm = month, yyyy = year, click on the calendar icon to choose from a dropdown menu.

Time of call: -- Enter the time at which you want the call to be. Click on the icon on the right to select the time from a dropdown menu.

Context for Santa: -- You can provide extra information to Santa Claus' AI for when the call is being made, so Christmas magic will be greater, you can also tell him to ask about certain things, tastes, hobbies or advice that Santa Claus should give like brushing teeth before going to bed.

Select Language: -- This is the language in which Santa Claus will speak and understand the call.

Phone number: -- The phone number that Santa Claus will call. An SMS will be sent to verify that the number is correct.

Call time -- The number of minutes you buy and the maximum the call would last with Santa Claus. If all minutes are not consumed, you can sign in again with the user ID and schedule another call for another day and time.
modal_help_text1:
Talk to Santa Claus

Fill out the form and Santa Claus AI will call at the specified time and day to talk to the person you indicate!

How to use:

Child's Name: -- Enter the name of the child Santa Claus will talk to

Gifts requested from Santa Claus: -- Enter the list of gifts requested from Santa Claus so the AI can play a better role and Santa Claus will know what gifts have been requested.

Select a country: -- Indicate the country where the child to be called is, to select the time zone afterwards and call at the appropriate time.

Call date: -- Enter the day you want the call to be made. dd = day, mm = month, yyyy = year, click on the calendar icon to choose from a dropdown menu.

Call time: -- Enter the time you want the call to be made. Click on the icon on the right to select the time from a dropdown menu.

Select Language: -- This is the language in which Santa Claus will speak and understand during the call.

Email: -- Enter your email address. This will be used to create your account or login if you already have one. Make sure it is a valid email, as you will receive important confirmations and will be able to recover your account in case you forget your password.
modal_help_text2:
Talk to Santa Claus

Fill out the form and Santa Claus AI will call at the specified time and day to talk to the person you indicate!

How to use:

Father's Name: -- Father's name. Write n/a if you prefer to omit this information.

Mother's Name: -- Enter the mother's name. Write n/a if you prefer to omit this information.

Context for Santa: -- Extra information can be provided to Santa Claus AI for when the call is being made, so the magic of Christmas will be greater. You can also indicate that he should ask about certain things, likes, hobbies, or advice that Santa Claus should give, such as brushing teeth before going to bed.

Phone Number: -- The phone number Santa Claus will call. An SMS will be sent to verify that the number is correct.

Call Duration: -- The number of minutes you purchase and the maximum duration of the call with Santa Claus. If not all minutes are used, you can log in again with the user ID and schedule another call for another day and time.

privacy_policy_info: At Acerting Art S.L., we respect and protect the privacy of our users. This policy details the information we collect and how it is used.
information_collected_info: We collect basic information such as names, email addresses, telephone numbers, etc. This information is used solely to be able to make calls and have context when speaking.
consent_control_info: By using our site, users consent to the collection of their information. Users can withdraw this consent at any time by contacting us.
